metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10049 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the ReadRLEImage function in coders/rle.c in ImageMagickbefore 6.9.4-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) or have other unspecified impact via a crafted RLEfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10049` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.2').
